title: yegorpetrov
author: yegorpetrov
content: Hey guys ðŸ‘‹ Iâ€™m auctioning original Bitcoin Infinity Key â€“ Public Keys #166 made by FractalEncrypt. Feel free to make your bids on the Plebeian Market. P2P lightning market created by Chiefmonkey. Here is the link where you can make your bids https://plebeian.market/auctions/2Q The link to the original tweet https://twitter.com/yeg0rpetrov/status/1540329435857145857?s=20&t=s24tL4i6BUi4OWDf6YcmiQ

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Just for some background for people here on the forum. I sold my Public Key #183 in February for .15 BTC, or 15 Million Sats.It was a private sale so I am excited to see what the public sale will go for.Best,BTCOVERFIATS

comments.author: thiago007
comments.body: With all due respect I ask, what makes it special that it has that value?Â  I see nothing but a figure of a key made of glass.Â  maybe I don't know what it really is and that's why I ask..

comments.author: pinky1234
comments.body: Quote from: thiago007 on June 24, 2022, 08:32:27 PMWith all due respect I ask, what makes it special that it has that value? Â I see nothing but a figure of a key made of glass. Â maybe I don't know what it really is and that's why I ask.. Â If you have not follow @FractalEncrypt Â your missing a lot . I have possession of 44/ 210 . its a beauty . there few art made by Fractal including The Bitcoin Full Node Sculpture, A Cypherpunk Chronometer which i would love to own one in the future.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Dont know much about them but the #8 private key version sold for 1.05 btc on scarce city. Heres the link.https://scarce.city/auctions/bitcoin-infinity-key-private

comments.author: domulys
comments.body: Oh man, FractalEncrypt's artwork is epic!Â  You can see one of his Bitcoin Full Node sculptures here behind Michael Saylor in his profile pic:Â  Â  https://twitter.com/saylor/status/1536378374725472257It's also featured on the cover of Knut Svanholm's seminal book:Â  Â  https://www.amazon.com/Bitcoin-Independence-reimagined-Knut-Svanholm/dp/B087638GJTMost of his stuff goes for six figures or more, except (perhaps!) for the Public Keys, which he made for "the plebs."Â  Somewhat by chance, only 210 were made:Â  Â  https://bitcoinmagazine.com/culture/the-bitcoin-infinity-day-public-private-keysI'll be watching this auction with bated breath.

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Did you win it? or was reserve not met?

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: Quote from: thiago007 on June 24, 2022, 08:32:27 PMWith all due respect I ask, what makes it special that it has that value?Â  I see nothing but a figure of a key made of glass.Â  maybe I don't know what it really is and that's why I ask..Â  It's a long read, but you will get an idea of the amount of thought/work put into creating those...https://bitcoinmagazine.com/culture/the-bitcoin-infinity-day-public-private-keys

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: tldr-hodl on June 27, 2022, 03:49:19 PMBecause I'm fuckin' idiot, I never noticed / got what it means - yep, "reserve was not met"...But in the end we managed to agree on 0.1615. So I guess I won.Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on June 27, 2022, 02:41:37 PMDid you win it? or was reserve not met?This was a totally good pick up, and at a reasonable price that will prove to be a bargain down the line.Â  Definitely HODL this and check demand again when bull season is back in session.

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: When Bitcoin is $500,000 no one is going to pay .15+ BTC for these public keys in my opinion.That will be $75,000 in fiat value per public key. The Bitcoin premiums will continue to diminish while the fiat values rise.Best,BTCOVERFIATS

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on June 27, 2022, 05:53:50 PMWhen Bitcoin is $500,000 no one is going to pay .15+ BTC for these public keys in my opinion.That will be $75,000 in fiat value per public key. The Bitcoin premiums will continue to diminish while the fiat values rise.Best,BTCOVERFIATSMost likely true but a few things we don't know:Â  1)Â  Will tldr-hodl HODL that long as they may exit sooner with a nice gain?Â  2)Â  As some collectors tend to use fiat to buy Bitcoin at current market to purchase collectibles instead of using Bitcoin that have been HODL'ing to do the same, it's possible this is what tldr-hodl did.

comments.author: pinky1234
comments.body: as long as you get what you paid ,Â  seller its good.Sale Ended2.26m sats$472.03anything above 2.6MÂ  its a win win

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: I paid 1.8 Million sats for mine and sold it for 15 Million sats. An 8.3x BTC denominated return.At the end of the day Bitcoin is my true love, not Bitcoin art. I had to part ways with it as .15 BTC will be a down payment on a house one day.

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on June 27, 2022, 07:18:49 PMI paid 1.8 Million sats for mine and sold it for 15 Million sats. An 8.3x BTC denominated return.At the end of the day Bitcoin is my true love, not Bitcoin art. I had to part ways with it as .15 BTC will be a down payment on a house one day.Excellent return, probably better than you expected.Â  This aligns with what you sought out to do and your future plans.Â  Everyone has different goals and objectives, ex, for some it's about the art, others about stacking sats, and for another subset making fiat to achieve whatever the desired outcome is.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on June 27, 2022, 08:03:33 PMQuote from: BTCOVERFIATS on June 27, 2022, 07:18:49 PMI paid 1.8 Million sats for mine and sold it for 15 Million sats. An 8.3x BTC denominated return.At the end of the day Bitcoin is my true love, not Bitcoin art. I had to part ways with it as .15 BTC will be a down payment on a house one day.Excellent return, probably better than you expected.Â  This aligns with what you sought out to do and your future plans.Â  Everyone has different goals and objectives, ex, for some it's about the art, others about stacking sats, and for another subset making fiat to achieve whatever the desired outcome is.Â  Well said. I believe that the art may be the best way to multiply those sats, and the most fun. Rarity cant be diplicated
